mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT cr.room_id, cr.room_name, cr.creator_id, cr.avatar_url, ucr.status, n.content FROM chat_rooms cr JOIN user_chat_rooms ucr ON cr.room_id = ucr.room_id JOIN notifications n ON cr.room_id = n.related_id AND ucr.room_id = cr.room_id WHERE ucr.user_id = #{userId} AND n.receiver_id = #{userId};
